author: pipermerriam
content:
From today's call:

- nethermind plugin at a point where we can start with figuring out how it interacts with `trin` 
- some minor fixes to `trin` to allow explicitly providing external IP address
- status SSZ library extraction is largely done, involved some amount of plumbing work
- i suggested teams look into what pieces of work they might be able to "snipe" CDAP participants with as project ideas.

author: pipermerriam
content: Would you guys like to resume taking notes on what gets discussed in the calls?  It was previously happening here: https://notes.ethereum.org/kva0bUSARI-I2VLx4eb6mw?edit  thanks to those that kept it up to date through the end of May.  Would you like to keep the same format?  Or do something like a github issue in the stateless specs repository?  Or something new?

author: nick.ghita
content: I've been tracking notes there - but missed the last two syncs. Happy to continue keeping the notes there up to date - but also open to whatever platform/format people prefer
